TopicSection.Content:
You can group data as a timeline view using Timeline layout grouping strategy. It can be generally used if there is only one level of grouping and the data type of the grouped column is [object date].

The above image is an example of timeline layout grouping strategy. 

Sample Code

In order to use timeline layout grouping strategy, you need to add the following two file references after "spreadgrid.js" script to your HTML page:

Javascript JS <script src="grunt-scripts/plugins/timelineStrategy.js"></script>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="css/plugins/timelineStrategy.css" type="text/css">

Timeline layout grouping strategy supports two different ways of displaying data namely:

  • Separate: In this mode of display, the timeline strategy separates the grouped data and then displays the item from left to right.
  • All: In this mode of display, the timeline strategy displays the grouped data on one side only. Javascript JS timeLinestrategy = new GcSpread.Views.GcGrid.Plugins.TimelineStrategy({
      displayMode:'separate'});

Timeline layout grouping strategy also supports the following two properties:

  • Gutter: It is the distance between the timeline and the group container.
  • Interval Distance: It is the distance between two layout items. Javascript JS

    timeLinestrategy = new GcSpread.Views.GcGrid.Plugins.TimelineStrategy({
       gutter:40,
       intervalDistance:40         
     });
